Merge pull request #3 from rillian/tone

Add a test program which plays a synthesized tone

Add a test program which plays a synthesized tone

Currently 'make check' just checks the API using silence. For
functional testing, it's nice to generate audible output to
verify the code is talking to the platform and hardware correctly.

This commit adds a 'test_tone.c' based on the example code
in the api documentation. It plays a simple synthesized
tone for one second.

Since playing audio automatically can be surprising, I didn't
add it to the tests. It must be run manually.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:kinetiknz/cubeb

Conflicts:
	Makefile.am

autotools support for switching backends.

Merge pull request #2 from rillian/master

update the example code to match the current API headers.
Update the example code to match the current API headers.

Fix a typo: build the pulse backend when pulseaudio is selected.

Previously the makefile build cubeb_coreaudio.c when pulseaudio
was selected as well as when coreaudio was selected.

Tested on Linux and MacOS X.

Detect and compile the appropriate platform backend.

Rather than hard-wiring which cubeb implementation to build,
check for available header files for the various platorm
audio APIs and generate the source list in the makefile
conditionally.

Tested on MacOS X with coreaudio.
update TODO.
alsa: assert arguments.
switch default build to alsa until build system is implemented properly.

alsa: revert previous simplification, it's not a large enough win.

This reverts commit e86128d272599b66c2084ea278c9ae0a6405c8ba.
alsa: start simplifying descriptor management by assuming each pcm provides only one descriptor.
alsa: simplify active stream management.
warning fixes.

alsa: remove unnecessary safe_{read,write} wrappers.  insert newly activated
streams at the start of the active streams list.  switch to doubly-linked
lists and store the list node in the stream to aid fast removal.
winmm: cast waveOutOpen arg to fix compile error.
winmm: experimental implementation using CALLBACK_THREAD.
use #defines for stream parameters in tests.
alsa: remove unworkable buffer configuration code.
add big-endian and native-endian variants of sample formats.
remove set_volume tests.
change cubeb_stream_init's latency parameter from frames to milliseconds.
remove CUBEB_SAMPLE_U8 use from tests.
remove cubeb_stream_set_volume.  remove CUBEB_SAMPLE_U8.
alsa: rework using ALSA's non-blocking poll API.
coreaudio: add diagnostics and logging while attempting to track down a lost IsRunning listener invocation.
pulse: reorder stream members to avoid dead space.
coreaudio: remove listener before stopping queue.
coreaudio: stop queue before disposing it.
alsa: initial attempt at alsa backend.
force-enable assert.
test: check end position.  allow stream to settle at startup.
dsound: add incomplete directsound backend.
winmm: add winmm backend.
coreaudio: install IsRunning listener at startup.  fix buffer rounding.
fix import botch up.
initial import (from 892ca582fe32577392a9843f14b8c5370df6ed78).
pulse: remove state callback before freeing userdata.
pulse: drain timing and error handling fixes.  addresses bmo# 752401.
bump version post-release.
bump version for 0.2 release.
build fixes for VC++2010.  update Makefile.am to build optimized by default.
winmm: process work items in batches to avoid stream starvation.
build system fixes for make dist.
audiounit: fix build on 10.5.
audiounit: stop using deprecated component API.  clean up OS X build steps.
changes to support building with MinGW.  fixes #10.
winmm: change priority of RDP and Vista latency kludges.
alsa: remove ugly PA detection, detect PA from the snd_config.
winmm: let high latency mode use different minimums depending on the environment.
alsa: deal with handle_underrun workaround failing with old PA plugins.
winmm: detect situations where winmm needs higher latency (Vista, RDP) and force a minimum latency value.
alsa: extend the hack from d8f950c4 to cover cases where the pulse pcm is a slave.
audiounit: make unit deinit failures non-fatal too.
add OpenSL ES backend.
audiounit: make unit initialization failures non-fatal.
alsa: resurrect the less dirty hack from 1aa0058d and make it work with dynamic ALSA configs.
revert accidental change to configure.ac.
add -Wno-unused to Makefile.am
upgrade Doxyfile to 1.8.x
audiounit: fix build after coreaudio -> audiounit rename.
alsa: error out of cubeb_stream_start when stream is in an invalid state.
alsa: initialize stream's last activity timer when starting stream.
alsa: second attempt: define _XOPEN_SOURCE to fix a BSD build issue.  fixes #6.
alsa: define _POSIX_C_SOURCE directly to fix a BSD build issue.  fixes issue #6.

Check for __BIG_ENDIAN__ when testing endianess.
Thanks to Tobias Netzel for the patch.

Revert "Revert "alsa: add a dirty hack to detect the PA plugin and round up the requested latency.""

Resurrect this workaround until a better one is available.

This reverts commit 668fb554f6d6d4b48f28bca4a914f595ef038657.

Revert "alsa: add a less dirty hack to detect the PA plugin and disable the flaky underrun handling in the plugin."

This isn't a sufficient workaround for all cases.

This reverts commit 1aa0058d0729eb85505df104cd1ac072432c6d24.
alsa: add a less dirty hack to detect the PA plugin and disable the flaky underrun handling in the plugin.

Revert "alsa: add a dirty hack to detect the PA plugin and round up the requested latency."

This reverts commit f3116936eba69aced240df7db77264269f3f95ae.
alsa: add a dirty hack to detect the PA plugin and round up the requested latency.
fix whitespace in test_tone.c
Fix tests after changing state callback signature.
sndio: fix latency calculation and S16BE handling.
Remove return type from state callback as it was never intended to support one.
alsa: increase cubeb_run_thread stack size to avoid blowing the stack with some alsa configurations.
import sndio backend for OpenBSD.
add cubeb_get_backend_id.  fixes #5.
alsa: remove debug mutex wrapper.

alsa: add a per-stream cond and wait for a safe state before stopping.

also move the active stream limit check to the top of stream_init (and
separate from stream registration), since it's possible to temporarily
exceed the limit if sufficient stream_init calls happen in parallel.

fix state transition clobbering caused by wrapping stream_refill in
PROCESSING/RUNNING transition by having stream_refill return the intended
final state.
minor comment clean up.
alsa: major simplification of stream and timer registration management.
pulse: tweak minreq calculation per bmo# 751030.
pulse: address mwu\'s review comments from bmo# 751030.
alsa: finish wrapping pthread_mutex_t.
test: add progress indicator to test_sanity.
more tests.
fix link flags.
add leak suppresion file for valgrind.
winmm, directsound: run refill thread at a higher priority.
alsa: set silent ALSA error handler once only.
alsa: fix remaining issues noted by XXX in the comments.

alsa: locking changes, stream limit hack, revert pipe2() change.

ref count waitables and move waitable processing outside of context lock.

pipe2() is only available on recent(ish) Linux kernels, so revert to pipe()
with explicit fcntl() calls again.

add a mutex wrapper that allows asserting the mutex is (and isn't) held.
winmm: drop stream lock on data_callback error.
alsa: rename reaper to watchdog, fix unlock in stream_start, warning fixes.
winmm: per documentation, there is no need to reprepare buffers when shrinking dwBufferLength.
winmm: define GUIDs locally to avoid linking issues with ksguid.lib.
winmm: horrible stream limit hack.
winmm: simplify cubeb_buffer_thread work loop.
audiounit: minor code cleanup.
alsa: set silent error handler for ALSA warnings.
winmm: make winmm API errors non-fatal; return rather than asserting.
alsa: dedup assertions.
alsa: document bug workarounds.  clarify some naming.
alsa: rename state_dumper to reaper and document it's purpose.
alsa: fixes for hung pcm streams and various alsa configurations.
winmm: refactor buffer management code.
test_tone: remove unused include.
link cubeb DSO against platform library directly so that the correct version symbols are used.
add CUBEB_STATE_ERROR to the API.
directsound: convert to sensible line endings.
audioqueue,audiounit,directsound,pulse: minor cleanups.
winmm: wrap WAVEOUT use in a lock.
alsa: rework locking, remove overly clever message passing code, rename some functions.
make CUBEB_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT an explicit negative value.
winmm, directsound: fix bytes_per_frame calculator for s16.
coreaudio: rename to audioqueue.  add audiounit backend.
always build test_sanity.
add status of directsound code to TODO.
alsa: take lock in refill.  resume stream earlier.
alsa: fix refill error handling.
alsa: post rework code cleanup.
Merge branch 'master' into alsa-refactor
winmm: remove bogus empty-slist assert.
Merge branch 'master' into alsa-refactor
pulse: pa_stream_drain is useless (see PA bug# 866), so use a timer instead.
alsa: first pass at a poll abstraction.  fix drain by using new poll timer object.
alsa: set processing thread stack size to minimum.  fix up includes.
alsa: remove unused buffer/period logging, remove rv check on snd_pcm_pause calls.
alsa: comment on thread safety, and rename some things for consistency.
Merge branch 'master' into alsa-refactor
Fix ALSA header name and string tests in configure.ac.
Merge branch 'master' into alsa-refactor
pulse: remove unused context_success_callback implementation.
Explicitly cap rate, channels, and latency.

winmm: cast to avoid double to size_t warning.
remove pragmas around jack includes.
post-merge build fixes.

Merge pull request #17 from padenot/android-headers

Mozilla Bug 850770: Import a modified version of an Android header

Import a modified version of an Android header

The SLES/OpenSLES_AndroidConfiguration.h header in the Android NDK has a bug
where the whole file is wrapped in |#ifdef __cplusplus| macro, so we can't get
Android specific OpenSLES values. This patch imports the header, with those
macros removed.

Additionaly, this patch moves the Android-specific headers in an src/android/
directory.
